mapper.insert: insert into czb_wechat_commodity_order (order_id, user_id, commodity_id, shop_id, actual_price, third_order, pay_status, pay_method, remark, electronic_code, order_state, address_id, qrcode, phone, commodity_source, fy_money, cost_price, commodity_type, commmodity_type_id, processing_time, handler, commodity_num, create_at, update_at ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{thirdOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{electronicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commoditySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{commodityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commmodityTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update czb_wechat_commodity_order
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actual_price = #{actualPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
third_order = #{thirdOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_method = #{payMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
electronic_code = #{electronicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_source = #{commoditySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fy_money = #{fyMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
commodity_type = #{commodityType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commmodity_type_id = #{commmodityTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
processing_time = #{processingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handler = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_num = #{commodityNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update czb_wechat_commodity_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actual_price = #{actualPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, third_order = #{thirdOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_method = #{payMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electronic_code = #{electronicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_source = #{commoditySource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fy_money = #{fyMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, commodity_type = #{commodityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commmodity_type_id = #{commmodityTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, processing_time = #{processingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handler = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_num = #{commodityNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT order_table.order_id AS orderId, order_table.third_order AS thirdOrder, order_table.order_state AS orderState, order_table.commodity_id AS commodityId, commodity_table.commodity_title AS commodityTitle, order_table.actual_price AS actualPrice, order_table.pay_status AS payStatus, order_table.pay_method AS payMethod, order_table.user_id AS userId, user_table.user_account AS userAccount, order_table.shop_id AS shopId, order_table.create_at AS createAt, commodity_table.shop_name AS shopName, commodity_table.shop_address AS shopAddress, commodity_table.commodity_img_id AS commodityImgId, order_table.commodity_source AS commoditySource, order_table.commodity_type AS commodityType, category.content AS content, commodity_table.take_way AS takeWay, delivery_table.delivery_state as deliveryState, order_table.remark AS remark FROM czb_wechat_commodity_order AS order_table LEFT JOIN czb_wechat_commodity AS commodity_table ON order_table.commodity_id = commodity_table.commodity_id LEFT JOIN czb_user AS user_table ON user_table.user_id = order_table.user_id LEFT JOIN czb_category AS category ON category.category_id = order_table.commmodity_type_id LEFT JOIN czb_wechat_commodity AS commodity_table ON order_table.commodity_id = commodity_table.commodity_id WHERE order_table.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT order_table.order_id as orderId, order_table.qrcode as qrcode, order_table.electronic_code as electronicCode, delivery_table.record_id as recordId, order_table.address_id as addressId, delivery_table.delivery_state as deliveryState, delivery_table.delivery_company as deliveryCompany, delivery_table.delivery_num as deliveryNum, order_table.processing_time as processingTime, order_table.handler as handler, commodity_table.take_way as takeWay FROM czb_wechat_commodity_order AS order_table LEFT JOIN czb_wechat_goods_delivery_records AS delivery_table ON order_table.order_id = delivery_table.order_id LEFT JOIN czb_wechat_commodity AS commodity_table ON order_table.commodity_id = commodity_table.commodity_id WHERE order_table.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE czb_wechat_commodity_order AS order_table SET order_table.processing_time = now(), order_table.`handler` = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_table.qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_table.order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHERE order_table.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE czb_wechat_commodity_order AS order_table, czb_wechat_goods_delivery_records AS delivery_table SET order_table.processing_time = now(), order_table.`handler` = #{handler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_table.qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_table.delivery_num = #{deliveryNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_table.delivery_company = #{deliveryCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_table.delivery_state = #{deliveryState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHERE order_table.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND delivery_table.order_id = order_table.order_id
